name: Captain Nasic
description:
Take control of Captain Nasic and their space ship to defend the Mini Planets from evil interdimensional aliens in this chaotic arcade-y space shooter. 

PC Game compatible with Keyboard or XBox Controller.

Game created in 7 days for the second Blackthornprod Game Jam.
Theme: Mini Planets.

Team: Sept Up

  • Amanda Lorena Duarte
  • Daren Trinh
  • Davi Sampaio
  • Rahul Poundarik
  • Steven Mirasola
  • Tony StGermain
  • Vinicius Oliveira
